snippet: The U.S. military has ordered mandatory inspections of all Lockheed Martin Corp F-35 fighter jets before further flights after a Marine Corps F-35B model suffered an in-flight emergency last week, a Pentagon spokesman said on Sunday....

headline.print_headline: U.S. Orders Mandatory Inspections for F-35s After Engine Issue
headline.main: U.S. Orders Mandatory Inspections for F-35s After Engine Issue

lead_paragraph: The U.S. military has ordered mandatory inspections of all Lockheed Martin Corp F-35 fighter jets before further flights after a Marine Corps F-35B model suffered an in-flight emergency last week, a Pentagon spokesman said on Sunday.
